item.title: 澳航预计全球油价下跌将降低燃油成本
item.description: 澳大利亚国旗航空公司澳航（Qantas）周五表示，在全球航空燃油价格下跌后，该公司预计燃油成本将低于此前的估计。【原文：Australian flag carrier Qantas said on Friday it expects lower fuel costs than previously estimated after a drop in global jet fuel prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚怀特黑文煤炭公司第一季度产量增长 82
item.description: 澳大利亚怀特黑文煤炭公司（Whitehaven Coal）周五公布的第一季度产量增长了82%，这得益于该公司从必和必拓（BHP）手中收购的炼焦煤业务产量上升，因为该公司正转向冶金煤。【原文：Australia's Whitehaven Coal posted an 82% rise in first-quarter output on Friday, aided by rising production at coking-coal operations it bought from BHP as the miner pivots towards metallurgical coal.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场低迷，关注日本
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 由于美国大选和地缘政治的不确定性，银行家认为投资不温不火
item.description: 聚集在华盛顿的银行高管们表示，有关美国走向的问题以及乌克兰和中东战争正在让投资者变得谨慎。【原文：Questions about the direction of the United States and wars in Ukraine and the Middle East are making investors cautious, bank executives gathered in Washington said.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Televisa 第三季度扭亏为盈
item.description: 周四公布的一份文件显示，墨西哥最大的广播公司 Televisa 第三季度实现净利润 6.665 亿比索（3385 万美元），而去年同期为亏损 9.185 亿比索。【原文：Mexico's largest broadcaster, Televisa, swung to a 666.5 million peso ($33.85 million) net profit in the third quarter from the 918.5 million peso loss in the same period a year earlier, according to a filing published on Thursday.】

item.title: 消费贷款机构 Capital One 第三季度利润增长，因为高利率增加了收入
item.description: Capital One 周四公布的第三季度利润增长了 1.6%，原因是利率上升使这家消费贷款公司从偿还信用卡债务的客户那里获得了更多收益。【原文：Capital One reported a 1.6% increase in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as elevated interest rates enabled the consumer lender to earn more from customers repaying credit card debt.】

item.title: 全球紧张局势下，L3Harris下调2024年业绩预期
item.description: L3Harris 公司周四上调了其年度利润和收入预期的下限，在全球安全问题不断升级的情况下，押注于持续的武器需求和强劲的国防开支。【原文：L3Harris raised the lower end of its annual profit and revenue forecasts on Thursday, betting on sustained weapons demand and robust defense spending amid escalating global security concerns.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止 Tapestry 85 亿美元收购竞争对手 Capri
item.description: 周四，一名美国法官阻止了美国手提包及配饰制造商 Tapestry 和 Capri 的 85 亿美元并购案，这是美国联邦贸易委员会在并购挑战罕见的行业中取得的一次胜利。【原文：A U.S. judge blocked the pending $8.5 billion merger of U.S. handbag and accessories maker Tapestry and Capri on Thursday, a victory for the U.S. Federal Trade Commission in an industry where merger challenges are rare.】

item.title: 得益于对 Hoka 鞋的强劲需求，Deckers Outdoors 上调了年销售额预期
item.description: 德克斯户外用品公司（Deckers Outdoor）周四公布的第二季度业绩超出华尔街预期，并上调了全年销售预期，原因是其 UGG 靴子和 Hoka 跑鞋等品牌继续在顾客中产生共鸣。【原文：Deckers Outdoor beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results and raised its annual sales forecast on Thursday, as its brands such as UGG boots and Hoka running shoes continue to resonate with customers.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利任命首席执行官 Ted Pick 为主席
item.description: 摩根士丹利周四表示，首席执行官泰德-皮克（Ted Pick）将接替詹姆斯-戈尔曼（James Gorman）担任下一任董事长。【原文：Morgan Stanley said on Thursday CEO Ted Pick would be its next chair succeeding James Gorman, who has been tapped to head the board at Walt Disney after he steps down as executive chair of the Wall Street titan at the end of the year.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止 Tapestry 85 亿美元收购竞争对手 Capri
item.description: 周四，一名美国法官阻止了美国手提包及配饰制造商 Tapestry 和 Capri 的 85 亿美元并购案，这是美国联邦贸易委员会在并购挑战罕见的行业中取得的一次胜利。【原文：A U.S. judge blocked the pending $8.5 billion merger of U.S. handbag and accessories maker Tapestry and Capri on Thursday, a victory for the U.S. Federal Trade Commission in an industry where merger challenges are rare.】

item.title: 瑞银首席执行官表示，瑞信客户迁移将耗时 18 个月
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）周四表示，瑞信客户向瑞银迁移的初期工作应该还需要 18 个月左右的时间，因为瑞银正在加紧整合其前竞争对手。【原文：The incipient migration of clients from Credit Suisse to UBS should take about another 18 months, UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti said on Thursday, as his bank presses on with the integration of its former rival.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Quikrete 正在洽谈收购 Summit Materials 公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，建筑材料供应商 Quikrete 已向竞争对手 Summit Materials 提出收购要约，后者市值超过 70 亿美元。【原文：Building materials provider Quikrete has approached rival Summit Materials , which has a market value of more than $7 billion, with an acquisition offer, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: Avangrid 以 1.6 亿美元向 Dominion Energy 出售海上风电租约
item.description: 伊贝尔德罗拉集团（Iberdrola Group）旗下的 Avangrid 公司周四表示，已完成将其 Kitty Hawk North 海上风电租约以 1.6 亿美元的价格出售给 Dominion Energy 公司。【原文：Avangrid , part of the Iberdrola Group, has completed the sale of its Kitty Hawk North offshore wind lease to Dominion Energy at $160 million, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长称将尽快解决部分财政问题
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）周四表示，巴西政府将很快发布公告，部分解决金融市场对财政问题的担忧，这些问题正在影响该国的风险溢价。【原文：Brazil's government will make announcements soon that will partly address financial markets' fiscal concerns that are affecting the country's risk premium, central bank chief Roberto Campos Neto said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本敦促二十国集团警惕外汇过度波动
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）周四表示，日本向二十国集团（G20）的同行们表示，当局必须对货币市场的过度波动和各成员国宏观经济政策的溢出效应保持警惕。【原文：Japan told its Group of 20 (G20) counterparts that authorities must be vigilant to excessive currency market volatility and spillovers from each member's macroeconomic policy, its finance minister Katsunobu Kato said on Thursday.】

item.title: 科罗拉多州爆发大肠杆菌疫情，麦当劳遭起诉
item.description: 科罗拉多州一名男子对麦当劳提起诉讼，这似乎是麦当劳因 Quarter Pounder 汉堡引发大肠杆菌疫情而遭到的第一起诉讼。【原文：A Colorado man has filed what appears to be the first lawsuit against McDonald’s over an E. coli outbreak linked to Quarter Pounder burgers that has killed one person and sickened nearly 50 others.】

item.title: 富国银行首席执行官称，其 CRE 办公楼贷款组合可能损失 20-30 亿美元
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）首席执行官查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）周四表示，该美国贷款机构的商业地产办公楼贷款组合可能会损失 20 亿至 30 亿美元。【原文：Wells Fargo Chief Executive Officer Charlie Scharf said on Thursday that the U.S. lender may lose $2 billion to $3 billion on its commercial real estate office loan portfolio.】

item.title: Perplexity 表示将在道琼斯和《纽约邮报》的诉讼中为自己辩护
item.description: Perplexity 周四表示，道琼斯和《纽约邮报》在诉讼中提出的版权侵权指控具有误导性，并誓言为自己辩护。【原文：Perplexity said on Thursday the allegations of copyright infringement in a lawsuit filed by Dow Jones and the New York Post were misleading, and vowed to defend itself.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚与卡塔尔的德克萨斯州液化天然气工厂建设项目延期三年
item.description: 一份监管文件显示，联邦监管机构周四批准埃克森美孚和卡塔尔能源液化天然气合资企业延期三年，以完成金色通道液化天然气工厂的建设。【原文：Federal regulators on Thursday gave an Exxon Mobil and Qatar Energy LNG joint venture a 3-year extension to finish building their Golden Pass LNG plant, a regulatory document showed.】

item.title: 麦当劳洋葱在美国爆发大肠杆菌疫情后受到审查
item.description: 美国农业部周三晚些时候表示，新鲜洋葱可能是麦当劳餐厅爆发大肠杆菌疫情的源头，该疫情已导致 49 人患病，1 人死亡。【原文：Fresh onions are the likely source of an E. coli outbreak at McDonald's restaurants that has sickened 49 people and killed one, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said late on Wednesday, alarming some McDonald's customers and other fast-food chains using onions as an ingredient.】

item.title: 由于供应链持续中断，霍尼韦尔销售预期出现下滑
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周四预计全年销售额低于华尔街预期，季度营收也不及预期，这家工业巨头正努力应对持续的供应链中断和工业自动化业务的疲软。【原文：Honeywell projected annual sales below Wall Street expectations and missed quarterly revenue estimates on Thursday as the industrial giant struggles with persistent supply-chain disruptions and weakness in its industrial automation business.】

item.title: 拜登政府对航空旅行竞争市场展开广泛调查
item.description: 美国司法部反垄断司和交通部周四表示，他们将对航空旅行的竞争状况展开广泛的公开调查。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department's Antitrust Division and the Transportation Department said on Thursday they are launching a broad public inquiry into the state of competition in air travel.】

item.title: 德国空中出租车制造商 Lilium 旗下公司申请破产，股价大跌
item.description: 德国空中出租车开发商 Lilium 周四表示，在与州政府和联邦政府谈判解决现金危机未果后，该公司在德国的两家子公司已决定申请破产。【原文：German air-taxi developer Lilium said on Thursday two of its subsidiaries in the country have decided to file for insolvency following unsuccessful talks with state and federal governments to solve its cash crisis.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁称世界经济面临低增长萎靡和不满加剧的风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周四警告说，世界正面临着陷入低增长、高债务道路的危险，这将使各国政府失去更多的资源来改善本国人民的机会并应对气候变化和其他挑战。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva warned on Thursday that the world is in danger of becoming mired in a low-growth, high-debt path that will leave governments with fewer resources to improve opportunities for their people and tackle climate change and other challenges.】

item.title: 麦当劳爆发大肠杆菌疫情后，百胜餐饮集团从餐点中剔除洋葱
item.description: 在麦当劳 Quarter Pounder 汉堡包引发大肠杆菌疫情后，百胜集团周四表示，出于 "谨慎起见"，将从某些塔可钟、必胜客和肯德基餐厅的餐点中去除新鲜洋葱。【原文：Yum Brands said on Thursday it would be removing fresh onions from its meals at certain Taco Bell, Pizza Hut and KFC restaurants out of an "abundance of caution", following an E.coli outbreak tied to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburgers.】

item.title: D.E. Shaw 在空气产品公司董事会之争中支持曼特尔里奇公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士周四透露，对冲基金 D.E. Shaw 改变了其在工业气体公司空气化工产品公司（Air Products and Chemicals）的改革运动路线，目前正在支持竞争对手激进分子的努力，而不是继续挑战自己的董事会。【原文：Hedge fund D.E. Shaw shifted course in its campaign for change at industrial gases company Air Products and Chemicals and is now supporting a rival activist's efforts instead of pressing ahead with its own board challenge, sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 主席表示，桑坦德银行将于 2025 年底前在美国建立一家提供全面服务的数字化银行
item.description: 西班牙桑坦德银行（Santander）执行主席安娜-博廷（Ana Botin）周四表示，到 2025 年，该银行将在美国拥有一家提供全面服务的数字银行。【原文：Spanish lender Santander will have a full service digital bank in the United States by 2025, its executive chairman Ana Botin said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国卫生部称，UnitedHealth 技术部门遭黑客攻击，1 亿人受到影响
item.description: 美国卫生部门网站显示，今年 2 月发生在 UnitedHealth 技术部门 Change 的黑客攻击事件影响了 1 亿人的个人信息，使其成为美国最大的医疗数据泄露事件。【原文：The February hack at UnitedHealth's tech unit Change affected the personal information of 100 million people, the U.S. health department's website showed, making it the largest healthcare data breach in the country.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，JBS 和 Sigma 正在争夺卡夫亨氏价值 30 亿美元的热狗业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，巴西肉类包装商 JBS 和墨西哥 Sigma Alimentos 是竞相收购包装食品巨头卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）旗下热狗和冷盘业务 Oscar Mayer 的两家公司之一。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS and Mexico's Sigma Alimentos are among those competing to acquire Oscar Mayer, the hot dogs and cold cuts business of packaged food giant Kraft Heinz , according to people familiar with the matter.】
